mapper.select: select * from ( select * from FUNDING order by FUNDING_WDATE desc ) where ROWNUM <= 4
select * from ( select * from FUNDING order by FUNDING_AMOUNT desc ) where ROWNUM <= 5
select FUNDING_CATEGORY_NAME from FUNDING_CATEGORY where FUNDING_CATEGORY_CODE=${category_code}
select * from ( select * from CREATOR order by CREATOR_NAME desc ) where ROWNUM <= 3
select * from ( select * from GOODS order by GOODS_REVIEW_NUMBER desc ) where ROWNUM <= 4
select * from CREATOR where CREATOR_NAME like '%'||#{creator_name}||'%'

select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (select * from FUNDING where FUNDING_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CREATOR_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by FUNDING_WDATE desc) aa) where rnum>${(funding_cp-1)*funding_ps} and rnum<=${funding_cp*funding_ps}
select COUNT(FUNDING_INDEX) from FUNDING where FUNDING_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CREATOR_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
